experience.description:
1. Projects management to introduce new services and to improve current one, inc. Artificial Intelligence: Machine Learning, Abbyy FlaxiCapture etc. Direction: electronic documents exchange and management, paper documents processing.
2. Task and project management for functional IT-subsystem. Parametrization and support activity is by using JIRA Atlassian. Working in Agile philosophy using Kanban methodology 
3. Designing, obtaining approvals and support of business-processes models, inc. by ARIS (environment, scenario and monitoring diagrams etc.) 
4. Business requirements definition, preparation of system requirements for development. Knowledge base maintenance by Confluence Atlassian. 
5. Tests result analysis and control 
7. Support of trial operation and industrial operations exploitation

Tasks in frail of activity, related Artificial Intelligence:
a) business-objects analysis and definition for recognition (inc. handwritten text, signatures and stamps), business logic for decision makings 
b) preparation and data markup for Mashine Lerning 
c) analysis of decision making statistics as the result of retro-data processing

5. Business-processes development and optimization 
6. Business requirements preparation and control of IT-changes

1. Business processes design based on JIRA technology
2. Financial models development, calculation of financial plans for profit & loss, cash flow, business and operation indicators.

4. Management reporting

1.	Agreements conclusion for projects maintenance.
2.	Project planning. Teambuilding for projects. 
3.	Deadlines control within tasks of projects.
4.	Performing project tasks in the field of banking retail products, SME financing, insurance:
•	financial modeling,

•	development of technical requirements to the software,
•	staff training.

The significant realized projects:

1. Visa Inc. 

Development and delivery of the training programs for the employees of Payment System's biggest customers:
•	sales skills improvement;
•	features of private bank card products; 
•	cards issue and transactions settlement procedures;

Results:
•	Increase in qualitative results of sales;
•	High satisfaction of trainings participants.

2. RGS-Bank & ROSGOSSTRAKH.

•	Development of aggregated business products to consolidate banking and insurance business lines, design of end-to-end business-processes and description of full cycle changes needed (functional, organizational and technology changes);
•	business processes analysis and re-engineering
•	drawing up specification on introduction of changes in the software of the bank and the insurance company
•	implementation of the new aggregated products in Payment Systems

Results:
•	The existing products of insurance company and bank have analyzed, the synergy is revealed;
•	The product line to consolidate bank product line and insurance company services has developed and described (including the development strategy, expected financial performance, target groups of clients, through business processes, resources for service);
•	Readiness of IT for work with the aggregated product line was estimated and the card of changes for the corresponding work is created.

a)    People management (capacity modeling and planning, motivation, performance appraisal etc., 6 subordinates, 2 sections)
b)   Business planning and finance model creation
c)   Business processes development (retail products related: auto loans, direct loans)
d)    Arrangement, control and management of operations activities for the following:
-    Card issuing (through external processing center )  
-    Clearing, settlement and reconciliation of card transactions 
-    Customers claims and recovered cards
-    MIS
